channel.title: LMG Remixes Contest!
channel.description:
Hello guys , how are you ?
One day, @Phoenix made a remix of my song Scorpion and it gave me an idea...
Remix contest for this song !
Project file: https://app.auxy.co/projects/BSW4BrCErd_XQKTUFhgdeA==
You can: • Change any instruments • Change the Tempo • Disable swing • Changing the Key • Changing the scale
Rules • Need to sidechain • Need to keep the same melody (you can change it slightly or create a second) • Need to keep the same drums (same as melody) • Don’t spit at your opponents • Don’t bite your opponents • Don’t remix while working or being in class • Don’t remix while driving
Prices:
3rd place: • Get a repost on YouTube • Recieve my very first song (exclusive)
2nd place: • Get a repost on YouTube • Get a logo/wallpaper (you decide)
1st place: • Get a repost on YouTube • Get his remix included on my album
Good luck everyone !

item.title: LMG Remixes Contest!
item.dc:creator: noxious
item.description:
Interesting, I’ll see what I can do.

item.title: LMG Remixes Contest!
item.dc:creator: LMG
item.description:
Hello guys , how are you ?

One day, @Phoenix made a remix of my song Scorpion and it gave me an idea…

Remix contest for this song !

Project file: https://app.auxy.co/projects/BSW4BrCErd_XQKTUFhgdeA==

You can:
• Change any instruments
• Change the Tempo
• Disable swing
• Changing the Key
• Changing the scale

Rules
• Need to sidechain
• Need to keep the same melody (you can change it slightly or create a second)
• Need to keep the same drums (same as melody)
• Don’t spit at your opponents
• Don’t bite your opponents
• Don’t remix while working or being in class
• Don’t remix while driving

Prices:

3rd place:
• Get a repost on YouTube
• Recieve my very first song (exclusive)

2nd place:
• Get a repost on YouTube
• Get a logo/wallpaper (you decide)

1st place:
• Get a repost on YouTube
• Get his remix included on my album

Good luck everyone !
